question: Who is appointed as the MD and CEO of Vijaya Bank?
explanation: The Cabinet panel appointed R A Sankara Narayanan, executive director of Bank of India, as MD and CEO of Vijaya Bank. He was overseeing the International operations of the Bank, covering 59 offices in 22 countries and contributing 29% of the Bank's business. He has worked as Head of Treasury operations, Zonal Manager, General Manager, National Banking Group.
